name: Effacor
short_description:
Effacor provides a drag-and-drop interface for the secure deletion of files from Hard Drives, and from Solid State Drives as well. 

Currently secure deletion is achieved using the Gutmann algorithm - although more methods are scheduled to be added in the near future.

TO USE: Simply drag-and-drop the files you wish to delete into the window, or use the "Add File to Task List" option from the FILE menu. 

Once all of the files you wish to delete securely have been added to the list hit "GO!", and each of the selected files will be deleted in turn.
summary: Effacor is a tool providing for secure file deletion.

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by Industry or Sector :: Security
